title: event tidbits: $799 iPad Pro price, always-on ‘Hey Siri’, ‘tvOS’ details
text: We’ve already run down most of what we’re expecting from the new iPad Pro, iPad mini 4, iPhone 6s, iPhone 6s Plus, Apple Watch bands, and the new gold Apple Watch Sport colors expected to be announced at Apple’s September 9th event. On the eve of the event, we’ve received some additional details from several […] »
